name: Architechs
description: A crew from the Fraternity of Technology; disciplined, well-equipped and highly efficient at recovering scrap. Working out of the Legacy-1 Archology to secure a foothold for Mankind, both TruMan and NuMan.

trait.name: Go and Do Likewise
trait.description: If the commander of this crew is unable to make a rout or strategy check, any Ready Veteran may do so as if it had the commander trait.

name: Ectopians
description: A crew of mutated plants and animals working for the rogue AI GAIA. Using only natural weapons they pursue the Ectopian agenda of destruction of the Ancient Artifacts and other technology. Waging war against ATHENA for dominance of New Eden.

trait.name: GAIA's Bounty
trait.description: Blessed with an abundance of healthy provisions, Ectopian crews start the Game with a free Break Token to use Once per Game.
